price: Por, kur i liruam nga vuajtja dhe erdhi afati i caktuar, ata e shkelën menjëherë premtimin.
arabic: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلرِّجۡزَ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ هُم بَٰلِغُوهُ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: falammā kashafnā ʿanhumu al-rij'za ilā ajalin hum bālighūhu idhā hum yankuthūna
